content.rendered:
Front Office Supervisor | Tulsa, OK
  • Full-time Monday-Friday 8am-5pm
  • Oversee the day-to-day dealings of physician clinic
  • Will assist with reports, managerial duties, scheduling and compliance requirements
  • Will report to Physician
  • Must have at least 3 years front office medical experience
  • Management/supervisor experience a plus
  • $16-$20/hour. DOE

DOE
